comments:
Set UrlRedirect to chart, system throw exception.

Steps:
1.Create a pie chart
2.Open chart builder
3.Go to Chart Format, Select "Value Series"
4.Click "Interactivity" button
5.Type=Mouse Click; Action=Url Redirect; Base Url=Http://www.sina.com.cn; click "Add" button
6.Preview in html

1.System can work well.
